title: Adult Coloring Book Of Expressions
features: Serene, happy, angry, sad. Puzzled, surprised, bored, thrilled. Our expressions... so varied... so rich!  Celebrate the variety of life! Color twenty four different human expressions put together into beautiful compositions. Paper Mystic presents Pop Art Coloring, a unique kind of adult coloring activity. Experience a simple, relaxing and enjoyable way to create beautiful pop art compositions. This book offers you the easiest way to beat stress - and, create stylish pieces of art. Now, you can be a pop artist too! This book helps you in being:

A Calm Colorist: The coloring pages of this book can help you escape from stress. Once you start coloring you will realize that this book is different. It makes your life even easier by choosing colors for you. Ever worry about whether you have picked the right color? Ever hesitate to share your colored pages because you are not sure of the color scheme? Worry no more! Pop Art Coloring presented in this book is color by numbers. Just pick a matching color pencil and color on. Pure calm.
A Calm Colorist:

The coloring pages of this book can help you escape from stress. Once you start coloring you will realize that this book is different. It makes your life even easier by choosing colors for you. Ever worry about whether you have picked the right color? Ever hesitate to share your colored pages because you are not sure of the color scheme? Worry no more! Pop Art Coloring presented in this book is color by numbers. Just pick a matching color pencil and color on. Pure calm.

A Confident Colorist: How long will you keep running away from stress? When will you face it? Overcome it? While other coloring books offer a temporary escape from stress, this book offers more. Use this book to practice our special “Just-Take-The-Next-Step” technique to beat stress. It’s simple, but effective.
A Confident Colorist:

How long will you keep running away from stress? When will you face it? Overcome it? While other coloring books offer a temporary escape from stress, this book offers more. Use this book to practice our special “Just-Take-The-Next-Step” technique to beat stress. It’s simple, but effective.

A Cool Colorist: You don’t have to be an artist. But, you will feel like one. And, your colored masterpieces? Eye candies! Bet you will want to frame some. If you share it with your friends, it will be insta-like plus insta-envy! Be cool. Feel like an artist.
A Cool Colorist:

You don’t have to be an artist. But, you will feel like one. And, your colored masterpieces? Eye candies! Bet you will want to frame some. If you share it with your friends, it will be insta-like plus insta-envy! Be cool. Feel like an artist.
Other Salient Features Of The Book:

Color By Numbers: All coloring pages in this book have outlines and numbers within regions. There is a palette with a color for each number. If you follow the scheme and color by numbers, you will certainly create something beautiful. However, if you are confident of your color-sense, then feel free to experiment with your own color schemes too.
Color By Numbers:

All coloring pages in this book have outlines and numbers within regions. There is a palette with a color for each number. If you follow the scheme and color by numbers, you will certainly create something beautiful. However, if you are confident of your color-sense, then feel free to experiment with your own color schemes too.

Full Color Book: While most coloring books are black and white, this books lets you enjoy your coloring activity in full color! Colored outlines and numbers are carefully crafted so that they are not visible after coloring. If colored properly, as per instructions, one cannot say that you used a coloring page with outlines to create the piece. This is what makes your colored page look stunning.
Full Color Book:

While most coloring books are black and white, this books lets you enjoy your coloring activity in full color! Colored outlines and numbers are carefully crafted so that they are not visible after coloring. If colored properly, as per instructions, one cannot say that you used a coloring page with outlines to create the piece. This is what makes your colored page look stunning.
Mood Pages: Every coloring page is accompanied by a mood page. Full color imagery. Scenic visuals. Wise quotes. We want you to have the best coloring experience!
Mood Pages:
Every coloring page is accompanied by a mood page. Full color imagery. Scenic visuals. Wise quotes. We want you to have the best coloring experience!

Start Simple, Go Pro: Coloring pages in this book are ordered from basic to advanced. First, ease yourself into this type of coloring. As you progress, color more intricate and more beautiful compositions.
Start Simple, Go Pro:
Coloring pages in this book are ordered from basic to advanced. First, ease yourself into this type of coloring. As you progress, color more intricate and more beautiful compositions.
Be calm. Be confident. Be cool. Happy coloring! _____________________  Designed By Paper Mystic
description: "If you need to relax, and just color, without any concern, then this book is perfect for that... This book takes a
unique approach to adult coloring books

, and simplifies the whole process... It's size, and the fact that it already lists the colors you need, makes it the perfect book for coloring on the go. It can fit in your bag, you only need a couple of colors, and a pencil sharpener...All in all,
I would highly recommend this book to anyone who truly wants to relax while coloring.
This book features Pop Art Coloring, a never before seen type of adult coloring activity! Beat stress and get relaxed by coloring 24 pop art compositions of different human expressions.
Practice our special 'Just Take The Next Step' technique to beat stress. Don't just ignore stress. Use this book as an effective tool to deal with stress.
It's color by numbers. It cannot get simpler! And the best part? When colored properly, the results are stunning! Don't be surprised if you decide to frame some of your colored pop art compositions!

author: {'avatar': 'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/81DOdJymh9L._SY600_.jpg', 'name': 'Deepak Srinivasa', 'about': ["Designing artwork for graphic posters is as interesting to me as is writing algorithms to optimize computer databases. I'm a computer science engineer by qualification, an innovation specialist by experience and a creativity researcher by passion. After thirteen years of software industry experience, with fifteen issued U.S patents under my belt, and a title of Master Inventor, I quit IBM Research in 2012. Later, freelancing as a consultant for digital creative agencies I found my calling - computational creativity. How can computers help creative professionals excel? Can computers be creative? These questions fuel an inspiring interplay between my creative and technical faculties.", "In 2016 I started BitGroovy, a techno-creative company focused on exploring the fringes between creativity and technology. Paper Mystic, a brand of BitGroovy, is an endeavor dedicated to applying computational creativity to creating interesting do-it-yourself consumer products. At Paper Mystic, I'm focused on designing craft activities that are fun and engaging. Pop Art Coloring books, Group Coloring posters and Stripe Art Drawing books are some of my current innovations."]}
